Title: Smart Irrigation System for Urban Farming
Problem Statement: Urban areas face challenges in sustainable food production due to limited space and water resources. Traditional irrigation methods are inefficient and waste water. There is a need for smart irrigation systems that can optimize water usage in urban farming environments.
Objectives: Develop a sensor-based irrigation system that monitors soil moisture and environmental conditions; Create an algorithm that optimizes water usage based on plant needs and weather forecasts; Design a mobile application for remote monitoring and control of the irrigation system
